about_the_game: The in-game editor enables the real-time editing of a number of items within Football Manager, such as a player's entire attribute profile, for example. You can also change 'under the hood' attributes like; current ability and potential ability. Staff details can be altered as well, and you can change club finances and reputation too. Note: This item can only be used in Football Manager mode.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11/12/13 with updates
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1, Intel HD Graphics 5000, NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M - requires 256MB VRAM and Metal
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 with updates - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD Athlon 64 X2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel GMA X4500, NVIDIA GeForce 9600M GT, AMD/ATI Mobility Radeon HD 3650 - requires 256MB VRAM and DirectX® 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Display: 1024x768. Performance scales with higher-end systems.
